title: Is there any way to do anything with any RP still on a banned account?
body:
Long story short, this account was banned yesterday and still has ~3500 RP on it.

I'm assuming there's nothing I can do about that RP, and that it's just stuck there with no way to spend or transfer it. _(Obviously this account itself can't use it for anything, but I could've still gifted friends or something...)_

replies.body: Once an account is suspended, you lose access to any content that was on that account. I'm sorry to be the bearer of bad news.
If they allowed permabanned people to gift over RP, people would just transfer it over to their new accounts.

Nope once perma, its all gone. 

R.I.P, and to the lost RP{{item:3026}}
